name: commandlinedeliveryapplications
description: A simple CLI application that calculates the delivery time and cost of a fictional logistics company.

scripts.verifySolution2: node deliveryApp.js start 100 5 PKG1 50 30 OFR001 PKG2 75 125 OFR008 PKG3 175 100 OFR003 PKG4 110 60 OFR002 PKG5 155 95 NA 2 70 200
